inclusion.criterion: no contraindications for hyperbaric oxygen treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: osteoradionecrosis grade 2, 3 or 4 according to the CTCAE v 3.0 criteria
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy or lactation (fertile female participants are required to use safe anticonception)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has Paget's disease of bone and is being treated with Bisphosphonate. The diagnosis was confirmed by a sister who had the same problems.
